hero.title: Preserving Legacies,
hero.subtitle: We believe every Kenyan family deserves to pass down their land with confidence, clarity, and peace. Shamba Sure exists to end the heartbreak of inheritance disputes and preserve generational wealth.

problem.title: Land Disputes Tear Families Apart
problem.p1: In Kenya, land inheritance is more than a legal process—it’s about family, legacy, and survival. Yet 26.2% of households face succession conflicts, and 38.6% of land loss stems from family disputes.
problem.p2: We’ve seen siblings become strangers. Parents’ final wishes ignored. Court cases drag on for decades. Families lose not just land, but trust, unity, and peace.
problem.p3: This wasn’t acceptable to us. We knew there had to be a better way.
problem.quote: "No family should lose their inheritance because of confusion, distrust, or outdated systems. Technology can solve this—and we’re committed to making it happen."

story.title: How Shamba Sure Began
story.p1: Shamba Sure was born from a deeply personal experience. Our founders witnessed firsthand how a lack of proper succession planning tore apart a family they loved—siblings who once shared everything became strangers fighting over land their parents worked decades to secure.
story.p2: We researched the problem and discovered it wasn’t isolated. Across Kenya, thousands of families face the same heartbreak. The tools existed—digital platforms, legal frameworks, secure technology—but no one had brought them together in a way that truly served Kenyan families.
story.p3: So we built Shamba Sure: a platform that combines the security of banking systems, the accessibility of mobile technology, and the wisdom of Kenyan succession law. We designed it for parents who want to protect their children, for families who value unity, and for anyone who believes their legacy deserves to be honored.
story.p4: Today, we’re proud to serve over 10,000 Kenyan families, preventing disputes before they start and giving peace of mind to landowners across all 47 counties.

team.value_1: We believe in building technology that strengthens families, not divides them.
team.value_2: We uphold honesty and integrity in every relationship we form.

team.value_4: We measure success by the peace and unity we help create.
